Text: you have probably hear I am not going to be with UBS which is both a disappointment and a blessing perhaps better things await me elsewhere While I have tried to convince myself of this it is difficult to truly accept I just wanted to let you know how much I have enjoyed working with you even if only for a short time Hopefully I will be able to stay on with the estate for a while while things are being settled and I make some decisions regarding the direction of my career I should be in the office tomorrow and next week perhaps we could chat if you have any advice for me I will gladly take it Best Regards Serena
